data.name: beVaiR Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The official beVaiR Soundtrack features 50 minutes best synthesizer cyberpunk beats. All tracks were composed exclusively for the game by Queplay Music. Get this exclusive package now with the official beVaiR gameplay trailer music, the main theme and all your favorite songs from the game.

Can you hear VaiR calling you? You can't resist the earworm!
